.. _`plot MA`:

PLOT MA
=======

Perform a MA plot over DESeq2 results





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_deseq2_plotma:
        input:
            res = "res.tsv"
        output:
            png = "MAplot.png"
        message:
            "Testing MAplot with DESeq2"
        threads:
            1
        resources:
            mem_mb = (
                lambda wildcards, attempt: min(attempt * 1024, 2048)
            ),
            time_min = (
                lambda wildcards, attempt: min(attempt * 10, 20)
            )
        log:
            "logs/test_deseq2_plotma.log"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/deseq2/plotMA"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Parameters:

* alpha_threshold: The padj threshold used to classify




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
